text: Uwe Timm (5 February 1932 - 7 March 2014) was a German writer, anarchist, and anti-militarist. He was the co-editor of espero. He was born in Hamburg, Nazi Germany. Timm died on 7 March 2014 in Barcelona, Spain. He was 82 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Uwe Timm at the German National Library Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Anarchists Category:Writers from Hamburg
title: Uwe Timm (libertarian writer)
